text:
Credit: Allen Berezovsky/Getty Images Good Sports

Spears admitted in January 2017 that she waited five months after meeting Asghari to call him. “I found his number in my bag. I was like, ‘He is really cute. This guy is really cute,'” she shared on Fast in the Morning With Nathan Fast. “So then I called him, and ever since then, he is just a really fun, funny person.”
